column2: "Good to see you again, senpai. The location is the Volcanic Caves, and the target is Sil Dinian."
"It's a close-range enemy that likes to close distance quickly by jumping in on you, so it's a bit tricky to fight."
"Maybe I'd have an easier time of it with a Katana, but I want to master the Bullet Bow first."
"But any weapon you use will be fine, senpai. I just need to see the timing."
